title: MOTDs can be versioned to force updates
message: Changes to most fields are already detected, so that dismissed MOTDs can reappear for updates. However, changes to the message may not be deteced, so increasing the version may be necessary.

title: Everything is fine!
message: The users are all very content. I put Prozac on their keyboards.

title: Everything is fine!
message: The users are all very content. I put Prozac on their keyboards. Things are better now.

title: Check this out

title: Houston, we have a problem
message: The print server is down. All hands on deck.

title: You can't see me!

title: Please vote
message: This MOTD will only show up on the 2020 election day.
